attrs.name: default-value
attrs.desc: Set the default search value in the search text box.

attrs.name: clearable
attrs.desc: The clear icon is displayed in attribute settings.

attrs.name: mini
attrs.desc: Mini mode. If this parameter is set to true, a round button with an icon is displayed by default. After you click the button, the button is displayed. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Set the placeholder text in the search box.

attrs.name: search-types
attrs.desc: Search type. The format is [{text:'Document', value:1}, ...]. If this parameter is not specified, All is displayed.

attrs.name: transparent
attrs.desc: Transparent mode. If this parameter is set to true, the border becomes transparent and is displayed semi-transparently after being collapsed. Generally, this parameter is used in scenarios with a background. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

slots.name: poplist
slots.desc: Slot in the search pop-up list

events.name: change
events.desc: Callback function triggered when input is complete in the input box; arg1:{Object search type}, arg2:{String value in the current input box}

events.name: search
events.desc: Callback function triggered when the search button is clicked in the expanded state; arg1:{Object search type}, arg2:{String value in the current input box}

events.name: select
events.desc: Callback function triggered when the type of the search component is switched; arg1:{Object search type}
